Introduction

Xing (short for Cross In New Gene) was a South Korean boy group formed by Xing Entertainment. The group made their official debut in December 2006, with the single “In Your Hands”. They were recognized among the top five most anticipated artists of 2007.

Over its active years, Xing experienced several changes in its lineup, undergoing five distinct generational shifts. Despite these changes, the fifth and final generation of the group did not have the opportunity to debut officially.
